title: Dangling two premium T206s out there for possible sale
author: timn1

posts.post_title: Dangling two premium T206s out there for possible sale
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

Normally I like to quote a definite sale price, but I'm on the fence about selling these so I thought I would invite offers and see what happens.  PLMK if you're interested and I'll try to work with you-

Cobb bat on shoulder - SGC 20

Pfeffer SGC 30 - beautiful Red Hindu back  SOLD

Dahlen Boston PSA 6 MC.  (FWIW, I would argue that it's not actually miscut because you can see a very thin strip of border all the way across the top.)

Scans at [url]https://imageevent.com/apspr/bbforsale?n=0[/url]

Hey Tim
I certainly have an interest in the Cobb and Red Hindu
If at any time,, you have a price in mind, please let me know
Thanks 
Dave
[url]collinsfamily4545@gmail.com[/url]

Sent PM. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
